Package org.opendaylight.controller.protocol_plugin.openflow

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDataPacketListen
    Interface to dispatch locally in the protocol plugin the data packets, intended especially for Discovery, main difference here with the analogous of SAL is that this is Global inherently.
    IDataPacketMux
    Simple wrapped interface for the IPluginInDataPacketService which will be only exported by DataPacketServices mux/demux component and will be only accessible by the openflow protocol plugin
    IDiscoveryListener
    The interface provides method to notify the local plugin listener when an edge is discovered or removed.
    IFlowProgrammerNotifier
    Interface which defines the methods exposed by the Flow Programmer Notifier.
    IInventoryProvider
    The Interface provides inventory service to the local plugin modules
    IInventoryShimExternalListener
    Wrapper of Interface that provides inventory updates locally in the protocol plugin.
    IInventoryShimInternalListener
    The Interface provides inventory updates to inventory listeners within the protocol plugin
    IOFStatisticsListener
    Interface which defines the notification functions which will get called when the information contained in the OF statistics reply message received from a network node is different from the cached one.
    IOFStatisticsManager
    Interface to expose the openflow statistics collected on the switches
    IReadFilterInternalListener
    The Interface provides notification of statistics (hardware view) updates to ReaderFilter listeners within the protocol plugin
    IReadServiceFilter
    Interface to serve the hardware information requests coming from SAL It is implemented by the respective OF1.0 plugin component
    IRefreshInternalProvider
    Topology refresh requested by the application from the plugin
    ITopologyServiceShimListener
    The Interface provides Edge updates to the topology listeners
